pr_title: GEODE-8313: Improve RedisData synchronization for toData

timeline.message: GEODE-8313: Improve RedisData synchronization for toData
added connection cleanup to test to see if it will pass in StressNewTest
removed some unneeded synchronization and fixed LGTM warnings

changed test to only connect to server1 and only restart
server2 and 3. Hopefully this will fix StressNewTest
disabled retry since server1 is never restarted
added tests for SADD and APPEND
redis functions no longer HA since that can cause operations to be done more than once
Replace APPEND with SET and still have functions be HA

timeline.bodyText:
The HashesAndCrashes test now tests hashes, sets, and strings. Do we still need SetsAndCrashesDUnitTest?
Or should we change HashesAndCrashes to only test hashes and add another test for strings?
I'm okay either way but we should probably do one or the other instead of both
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal
